Row.Text: +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age on Diplomacy and Happiness Buildings.
+10%[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Cities while at peace.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age for active Endeavors, Sanctions, and Projects you started or supported.
+2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per Age for every Leader you are Friendly or Helpful with.
+1% towards all yields for every City State you are Suzerain of. Repeatable.
